website_summaries.verdict: An effective, easy-to-use solution with an appealing price.
pros: Fast, easy access to the cleaning solution comes in handy during emergencies
cons: Some owners say there is less fluid in the bottle than they expected

customer_reviews.title: Great product and we will definitely continue to buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very important eyewash as it does not have a bunch of chemicals in it just saline solution and is safe for babies, kids, cats and dogs. Chemical eye washes are toxic to pets and can harm their eyes. We uses this for runny eyes, irritated eyes and tired eyes. Great product and we will definitely continue to buy it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Doveny

customer_reviews.title: This works great to flush out the gunk that shows up each ...
customer_reviews.text: My Cairn Terrier has chronic dry eye and needs his eye cleaned daily. This works great to flush out the gunk that shows up each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pack

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy to use in emergency
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy to use in emergency. Easy twist off cap, directional and controllable stream of sterilized water. A MUST for any emergency med kit. I purchased enough for the car, bathroom, and emergency medical kit I carry with when taking kids to park. Wish I'd had this back when my granddaughter got sand in her eyes playing in sandbox at park. I'll have it when any of the children at the sand box does again. Amazing how often it happens! Cheap insurance for something as precious as eyesight.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Cap was loose, protective seal still in place
customer_reviews.text: Even though the protective seal was still in place, the liquid stained the bottle label. The top could be unscrewed slightly allowing the liquid to drip out. However when I got the item the cap was tight. That means the top was loose before shipping and tightened when placed in the box and shipped. I got the eye drops for my dog and he wants nothing to do with it. So haven't actually used the drops.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great eye wash
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Comfortable in use on eye. Clears most substances from your eyes. We have cats and their hair seems to think that my eyes are their second home.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as pictured. It had a bottle with a resealable top. I specially bought this because it showed a single use bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small first aid kit replacements. Good for a heavy flush of the eye/s. This set allowed me to replace the expired ones in both cars and the house kits. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall R Nau

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I use these to wash out my poodles eyes in the evening to help his allergies. It works fine, but comes out too fast, so it makes a mess if I’m not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Leichtle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product w/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Value for a healthy product that has to be used several times a day on a blind dog with severe chronic dry eye with mucus.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Restocking first aid kit, 4 0z is a great size to have on hand
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Good for Esthetican rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Outfitting a new Esthetics room we needed a few things. This 4 ounce bottle of eye wash helps meet our requirements and also keeps the products in a manageable size.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great for flushing sand out of eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few for all our fist aid kits in home and vehicles. Kid got some grains of sand in his eyes. Product was great and didn’t scare a 5 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa RN, PHN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s really not enough to effectively flush an eye in any situation
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my first aid kit. Never know when you need an eye wash. And a sink might not be available.
customer_reviews.author: sharon lilley

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used for my newborns clogged eye duct. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Mayrha

customer_reviews.title: Good price.  An essential at home or in the car.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and good price compared to competitors. An essential at home or in the car.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Home or business use
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable inclusion for first aid kits and price is in line.
customer_reviews.author: CBI

customer_reviews.title: The best I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: The solution feels so good on my itch dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Holmes

customer_reviews.title: An expensive bottle of water.
customer_reviews.text: It works like a bottle of water works. Has no exceptional redeeming quality.
customer_reviews.author: five cats

customer_reviews.title: Good for night use or early morning red eyes
customer_reviews.text: You can’t find quality like this in regular retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don't need it, but low cost insurance.
customer_reviews.text: Same as the burn cream, haven't used it, but have it in home and both vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. Although I do wish that it was more effective but it gor the job done
customer_reviews.author: natalee conrad

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the product we were looking for. A small (4oz.) eye wash bottle that will fit in the first aid kits in our work trucks. Good price point. Have not needed to use the product yet and will update review if we ever do. The shipping was fantastic! I ordered the product on Wednesday and received it on Friday (just 2 days later!) using the Free Suuper Saver Shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Perfect to carry in vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for plumbing company, one in every vehicle. Expiration date was Aug 2017 for mine, i would assume that is normal shelf date, ( we use ours in that amount of time) they work great and you can use the cap if you dont use the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: 54vior

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if this was saline solution but, it is and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Single use - cannot be resealed which is fine because you wouldnt want it contaminated
customer_reviews.text: 4 oz in a bottle - generally all you need for a small first aid kit. Single use - cannot be resealed which is fine because you wouldnt want it contaminated.
customer_reviews.author: Gauge14iv

product_meta.title: Medi-First Eyewash, Eye Rinse and Protection, First Aid Supplies, 4 Oz.
product_meta.description:
Size:4 OuncesWhen you have an emergency, trust Media-First to help you out. We create products that are geared toward treating and easing pain and discomfort. We use only the best quality ingredients to create our products, ensuring that you get the proper care you need. This eyewash is no exception! It is a sterile irrigating solution that is designed to flush particles from the eyes quickly, giving you instant relief. This eyewash is made from buffered, isotonic saline, making it perfectly safe for your sensitive eyes. When something gets in your eyes, the first thing you’ll want to do is rinse it out. That’s where this eyewash comes in. To open it, simply twist the cap to break the seal. Then, apply a few drops into your eyes to clean them. The saline will work quickly to flush out any germs, bacteria, and dirt. This cleansing solution is just what you need to keep your eyes safe. Its small size makes it perfect for first aid boxes and survival kit. Just set it in with all of your other medical supplies. If you’re looking for a first aid box, consider our first aid Cabinets. Just click On our storefront page to check out our other products. This bottle contains 4 oz. Of eyewash solution and is only intended for single-use. Once you have opened and used The bottle, properly dispose of it. This bottle is great for settings where the risks of getting something in your eyes are higher. For example, it is an invaluable asset in laboratories, doctor and nurses’ offices, and science classrooms. You never know what will happen in the event of an emergency, so it’s good to keep this eyewash on hand.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Refreshes and cleanses tired and irritated eyes. Sterile irrigating solution flushes particles from eyes quickly.
